require_scac_for_asn.description: Prevents sending an ASN when SCAC is not specified

require_attached_documents.description: Prevents sending an ASN when the order has no attached docs

asn_pre_check_options.description: Prevents sending an ASN when any of the checks associated with the options in this bit flag fail

order_level_flex_fields.descriptions: Prevents sending an ASN when the listed Flex Fields are not all specified at the order level

order_item_level_flex_fields.description: Prevents sending an ASN when the listed Flex Fields are not all specified at the order item level
